title: Space ACME
description: Space ACME is a 3D visualization tool for training satellite operations teams in space domain awareness.
preview: Space ACME is a 3D visualization tool for training satellite operations teams in overall readiness. /n This is accomplished by combining real and user-generated data to create training scenarios. I lead a team of engineers in building the MVP stages of the project using ThreeJS, React, and Python Flask.

title: Astro UXDS
description: Astro is a web component based UX design system. It is an open source project used in public and private space applications.
preview: Astro has been acknoledged for greatly contributing to space military readiness by reducing training time between applications for operators thoughout the space domain. /n /n I contributed to a StencilJS re-write as well as several new reusable components to the library.

title: Isonas Pure Access
description: A web app designed to manage door access for commercial and multi-family buildings.
preview: A web application to control and manage door access for commercial and multi-family buildings. Pure Access is a Single Page Application built in ReactJS utilizing Redux, Sagas and Material UI. /n /n I was hired for a 13-week contract to contribute to a complete ReactJS rewrite of the Front End application. Utilizing a very short 3-hour introduction to the codebase I was able to begin coding components on day 1. In the short 13-week contract I was able to contribute over 8,000 lines of code spanning multiple key features and bug fixes.
